input.code: val rows = (employeeAt ++ is_historian_at ++ is_professor_at ++ museum_at ++ teaches_history_at).toList

val pairToPairIx = rows.zipWithIndex.toMap
val data = List(is_historian_at, is_professor_at, museum_at, teaches_history_at, employeeAt).map(_.map(pairToPairIx))
Matrix((0 until rows.length).map(row => (0 until cols.length).map(col => if (data(col).contains(row)) 1.0 else 0.0).toSeq).toSeq)
